titleStmt.title: Corante, or, nevves from Italy, Germany, Hungaria, Bohemia, Spaine and Dutchland. 1621

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Broyer Iohnson corantere to his excellency,

notesStmt.note: Caption title. Place of publication from STC.
In the unique copy in the British Library under the imprint is written in an old hand "the third"--Cf. Dahl.
Identified as STC 5747b on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Bound and filmed with other issues.

person.persName: Broyer Iohnson corantere to his excellency
